cards.rules_text:
Haste, trample
Heracles enters the battlefield with 12 Labor counters.
If Heracles wold leave the battlefield remove a Labor counter instead.
As long as Heracles, has a Labor counter he cannot be sacrificed.
At the beginning of your upkeep you may pay {X} and put a labor counter on Heracles, where X is the number of labor counters on him minus 1.

Deathtouch, Flash
If you would take damage from a source an opponent controls you may prevent that damage and have Passionlip take that damage instead
Whenever Passionlip takes damage from a source an opponent controls its controller exiles that many cards from the top of their library

First strike
Whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks deal 1 damage to that creature and 1 damage to its controller.
Whenever you cast a creature spell target creature an opponent controls must attack on their controllers next turn.

Trample, first strike
Whenever Raikou attacks, for each opponent create a token that is a copy of Raikou except they aren’t legendary that’s tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat

When Queen of Sheba enters the battlefield create three 2/2 blue Djinn tokens
Whenever a Djinn you control deals damage to a player create a treasure token.

Forestwalk, haste
If you control a Forest Jaguar Man gets +1/+1.

Lifelink
When Baobhan Sith, Tam Lin enters the battlefield create a token that is a copy of target creature an opponent controls except it is a 1/1 and has no abilities.
Whenever a creature you control is destroyed, destroy all creatures with the same name that your opponents controls.

Deathtouch
{5}{B}{B}{B}:Monstrosity 5
When Gorgon becomes monstrous, tap all other creatures and place a stun counter on them, then destroy those creatures.
As long as Gorgon is monstrous she has trample.

{X}{R}{R},{T}: Exile the top X cards of your library, you may cast cards exiled this way with mana value X or less until the end of the turn.

Whenever you lose life, Passionlip gets +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
{1}{B},{T}:Destroy target creature with power less than Passionlip’s power, activate only as a sorcery.
The beginning of combat on your opponents turn, tap up to two target creatures that player controls.

{U}: Exile target creature you control, Kazuradrop, gains all activated abilities of that creature.

First strike

Indestructible, haste
Whenever BB attacks phase her out.
Whenever BB phases in search you may search your library for a creature and exile it.
You may cast cards exiled by BB.
Whenever you cast a creature from exile, it enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it.
